description:
Wonderful opportunity to secure this near new apartment as it’s the ideal entry level into the out-of-control property market. Perfect for the first home buyer, shrewd investor looking for high rental yields, or the downsizer looking at having all amenities within walking distance - this is the property for you!

Offering two spacious sized bedrooms with built in robes, master with study nock and two bathrooms this apartment is all about location, in the heart of leafy Blackburn within easy walking distance to the train station, bus depot, restaurants, shops, local schools and less than 20km from Melbourne CBD.

The natural light filled open plan living design opens out to a full width private terrace ideal for entertaining or basking in the tranquillity that is Blackburn. Fully equipped kitchen with stone benchtops and excellent storage space with premium Bosch appliances including dishwasher makes the kitchen the heart of this apartment.

Inclusions: split system air conditioning & heating, secure entry with video intercom and lift access, contemporary laminate flooring, carpeted bedrooms, European laundry, embedded network, while a storage space and remote-control secure basement parking (not stacker) completes this superb apartment. Inspections will impress.

The property is currently leased out at $450 per week.

Noel Jones Real Estate has taken every precaution to ensure the information contained herein is true and accurate, however accept no responsibility and disclaim all liability in respect to any errors, omissions, inaccuracies, or misstatements that may occur. Prospective purchasers should make their own enquiries to verify the information contained herein.
